headline: Tech Stocks Drive S&P 500 Higher to Mark 35th Record Close For 2025
summary: Wall Street decided to bid up U.S. stocks--small and large-- as investors rejoiced over a fragile trade truce between U.S., China and expectations of even lower interest rates.  The S&P 500, which closed up 1.2%, has marked its 35th record for 2025, the most out of the three.  Dow settled 0.7% higher, Nasdaq was up 1.9%.
